author: Ruben Hassid
author_headline: Master AI before it masters you.
text:
BREAKING: Google offers AI courses.

It's free by following these 9 links:

1 - Organize any project with NotebookLM

How to use NotebookLM to centralize project notes, upload sources, and let AI find info, summarize, and draft new documents.

Access it: https://lnkd.in/dtku9V-y

2 - Gemini Gems for marketing

How to create, refine, and implement Gemini Gems (pre-trained Gemini chats) for marketing.

Access it: https://lnkd.in/dx_bmCds

3 - Customer insights with NotebookLM

How NotebookLM saves hours of call listening by analyzing hundreds of transcripts from one PDF.

Access it: https://lnkd.in/dvE6Htkq

4 - Content Generation with Gemini Made Easy

How to break through writer's block with Gemini in Docs. 

Access it: https://lnkd.in/dcmiddxY

5 - Personalization with customized prompts

How to personalize your Gemini prompts using Google Drive files.

Access it: https://lnkd.in/dB6cfxyB

6 - Prompting like a Pro with Google Workspace

How to write effective Gemini prompts for Google Workspace. Discover the Persona, Task, Context, Format framework to get targeted AI responses.

Access it: https://lnkd.in/d9Vrwn6q

7 - Email Content Creation

How to streamline your emails with Gemini in Gmail. You'll see how to use 'Help me write' to draft professional emails from a simple prompt, refine the tone with one click, and reply to customers by pulling information directly from your Drive.

Access it: https://lnkd.in/dcJRJJnt

8 - NotebookLM for Market Research

How to accelerate key marketing research tasks with NotebookLM. You'll see specific workflows for synthesizing customer feedback, summarizing competitor reports, and generating new content ideas grounded in your data.

Access it: https://lnkd.in/dF4z7f_s

9 - How to master AI with words (not code)

Shameless plug: it's my own (free) newsletter.

Join 120,000+ weekly readers at how-to-ai.guide.
